This is not the page you're looking for (HTTP 404)

The URL you requested ("[path]") doesn't exist.

In this µWeb example project, every URL that begins with "broken" results in this page. For this particular case, there need not be a slash following "broken", so /brokenheart also 'works'. If you got to this page without the URL starting with "broken", that's a bug and we'd like to know about this.
